comment: Great Indiana bourbon! Live about 20 minutes away from the distillery. These guys are passionate about what they make.
Very wheat heavy flavor. Unfortunately I’m not a huge wheat guy. Nice subtle flavors of caramel and vanilla, but subtle.
Spicy kick but might prefer as a mixer

There might be bourbon here, but you won't be tasting it. This hits like they poured a cup of sugar into each bottle, and it has ruined what is left. Possibly the worst tasting "bourbon" I have had, because it really does not taste like one.

Nose: CORN, Corn Pops cereal, Vanilla, Hay, Dusty

Taste: Eating Corn Pops w/Vanilla Milk in a Hay Field during a Dust Storm

Aroma: honey. Slightly cherry. Vanilla. Very pleasant 
Flavor: honey. Vanilla. No burn. Very mild. Rep says it’s the most approachable whiskey they sell
Smooth. Smokey. Sweet. Reminds me of scotch.
Smell is quite pleasant with sweet vanilla, oak, some fruit.  Definitely get a lot of oak taste.  Not a lot of tingle, very smooth.  Finish is strong, but does not linger long.
